Description: BC Rich Avenge SOB Onyx/Red Bevel 6 String Electric Guitar B.C. Rich Avenge SOB in very nice used condition, the body does have normal scuff and small scratches from being played. As shown in the pictures the guitar has two chips in the finish. The neck is straight and the frets are in good condition. This auction is for the guitar only, it does not include a case. At 10% smaller than his cousin the Beast, the B.C. Rich Avenge SOB is designed to rock! This SOB guitar features rosewood fingerboard, red-edged Beast style headstock, a single high output BDSM humbucker pickup with a single volume, bolt-on neck, black hardware, blood red bevels and beast wing inlay.
